analyzed: dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis mi skye bar shes pa mi 'thob bo //
translated: All perfected beings do not obtain the cognition of exhaustion and the cognition of non-arising.

original: so so'i skye bos 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems gnyis spong ngo //
analyzed: so so'i skye bos 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems gnyis spong ngo //

original: phyi rol pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yod do //
analyzed: phyi rol pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yod do //

original: lha rnams la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la dmigs so //
analyzed: lha rnams la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la dmigs so //

original: snyoms par zhugs pa bdun la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs kyi gzhan rnams la ma yin no //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa bdun la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs kyi gzhan rnams la ma yin no //

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bsdus so //

analyzed: bsam gtan la brten nas ni yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa nyid du 'jug go //

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'thob bo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'thob bo //

analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid rjes su 'thob kyi yang dag pa nyid skyon med par mi 'jug go ;
translated: One obtains the status of an arhat by means of the form and formless realms, but one does not enter into the faultless state of correct direct knowledge.

original: /'dod khams su yang dag pa nyid skyon med par 'jug go //
analyzed: /'dod khams su yang dag pa nyid skyon med par 'jug go //
translated: One enters into the faultless state of correct direct knowledge in the desire realm.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'thob bo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'thob bo //
translated: One obtains the status of an arhat.

original: gzugs kyi khams su dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob kyi yang dag pa nyid skyon med par mi 'jug go //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob kyi yang dag pa nyid skyon med par mi 'jug go //
translated: One obtains the status of an arhat in the form realm, but one does not enter into the faultless state of correct direct knowledge.

original: byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na 'dod chags dang bral ba med do //
analyzed: byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na 'dod chags dang bral ba med do //
translated: There is no one free from attachment in Uttarakuru.

original: der 'phags pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der 'phags pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Aryans are not born there.

original: 'du shes med pa'i sems can lha rnams kyi nang du mi skye'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i sems can lha rnams kyi nang du mi skye'o //
translated: One is not born among the gods who are devoid of ideation.

original: mthar gyis dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bras bu bzhi thob par nges pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bras bu bzhi thob par nges pa med do //
translated: One is not certain to obtain the four fruits of the sramana in the order in which they are enumerated.

original: skyon med par zhugs pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par byed do //
analyzed: skyon med par zhugs pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par byed do //
translated: The person who has entered the state of non-learner obtains the fruit of once-returner and the fruit of non-returner by means of the mundane path, through detachment from the realm of desire.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin ni chos thams cad yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin ni chos thams cad yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: All factors should be mentioned as being like the four foundations of mindfulness.

original: phra rgyas rnams ni sems las byung ba'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: phra rgyas rnams ni sems las byung ba'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams so //
translated: The proclivities are mental factors associated with the mind.

original: phra rgyas thams cad ni kun nas dkris pa dag ni phra rgyas dag ma yin no //
analyzed: phra rgyas thams cad ni kun nas dkris pa dag ni phra rgyas dag ma yin no //
translated: The entanglements are not proclivities.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag 'dus byas so //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag 'dus byas so //

original: dgra bcom pa la rten cing 'byung ba'i yan lag kha cig rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa la rten cing 'byung ba'i yan lag kha cig rjes su 'jug go //
translated: Some members of dependent origination continue in the perfected being.

original: dgra bcom pa la bsod nams 'phel ba yod do //🔽'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams na bar ma do'i srid pa dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa la bsod nams 'phel ba yod do // 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams na bar ma do'i srid pa dmigs so //
translated: The perfected being increases merit.

original: rnam par @145a * //
analyzed: rnam par @145a * //
translated: Intermediate existence is perceived in the realm of desire and in the realm of fine-materiality.🔽The perfected being is not reborn through transformation.

original: shes pa'i tshogs lngas kun tu 'dod chags par 'gyur gyi 'dod chags bral bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i tshogs lngas kun tu 'dod chags par 'gyur gyi 'dod chags bral bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The five aggregates of consciousness are attached, not detached.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
translated: The five aggregates of consciousness apprehend their own characteristics and are non-conceptual.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams yod do //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams yod do //
translated: There are mental factors.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi dmigs pa yod do //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi dmigs pa yod do //
translated: There are objects of the mind and mental factors.

original: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: The nature of things is not endowed with a nature.

original: sems ni sems dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sems ni sems dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: The mind is not endowed with a mind.

original: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba yod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba yod do //
translated: There is mundane right view.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dad pa'i dbang po yod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dad pa'i dbang po yod do //
translated: There is the mundane faculty of faith.

original: lung du mi ston pa'i chos rnams yod do //
analyzed: lung du mi ston pa'i chos rnams yod do //
translated: There are neutral phenomena.

original: dgra bcom ba la slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom ba la slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams yod do //
translated: There are phenomena that are neither for the trainee nor for the non-trainee.

analyzed: dgra bcom pa thams cad bsam gtan thob pa yin kyang thams cad du bsam gtan mngon du mi byed do //

original: dgra bcom pa la sngon gyi las dag par myong bar 'gyur ba yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa la sngon gyi las dag par myong bar 'gyur ba yod do //
translated: There are arhats who have pure karma to experience.

original: so so'i skye bo la 'chi ba'i mtha' las byung ba'i sems mi dge ba yod do //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo la 'chi ba'i mtha' las byung ba'i sems mi dge ba yod do //

analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa la de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med do //

translated: Bodhisattvas are said to be ordinary beings, to have fetters, to not have entered faultless reality, and to have entered the level of ordinary beings.

original: sems can du gdags pa rnams la zin pa'i rgyud yin par brjod par bya'o//
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa rnams la zin pa'i rgyud yin par brjod par bya'o//
translated: They are said to have a continuum that is grasped in terms of sentient beings.

original: 'du byed thams cad ni skad cig ma dag go //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad ni skad cig ma dag go //
translated: All formations are momentary.

original: 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du chos gang yang 'pho ba med kyang gang zag 'pho zhes brdar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du chos gang yang 'pho ba med kyang gang zag 'pho zhes brdar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Although nothing whatsoever passes from this world to the next world, it is said conventionally that a person passes.

original: 'chi bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po lhag ma med par 'gags kyang phung po rnams la 'gyur ba ni med do //
analyzed: 'chi bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po lhag ma med par 'gags kyang phung po rnams la 'gyur ba ni med do //
translated: Even though the aggregates of conditioning formations are stopped without remainder, as if dead, there is no change in the aggregates.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan yod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan yod do //
translated: There is supramundane concentration.

original: rnam par rtog ba zag pa med pa yod do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog ba zag pa med pa yod do //
translated: There is uncontaminated imagination.

original: rnam par rtog pa srid pa'i dge ba yod do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa srid pa'i dge ba yod do //
translated: There is virtuous imagination in existence.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa la tshig brjod pa med do //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa la tshig brjod pa med do //
translated: There is no verbal expression in meditative equipoise.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: The wheel of the Dharma is the eightfold noble path.

original: nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde yod do //
